title: Sociology of Race and Ethnicity - Settler Simultaneity and Anti-Indigenous Racism at Land-Grant Universities
itunes:title: Sociology of Race and Ethnicity - Settler Simultaneity and Anti-Indigenous Racism at Land-Grant Universities
description: Author Theresa Rocha Beardall discusses her article, "Settler Simultaneity and Anti-Indigenous Racism at Land-Grant Universities," published in the January 2022 issue of Sociology of Race and Ethnicity.
content:encoded: Author Theresa Rocha Beardall discusses her article, "Settler Simultaneity and Anti-Indigenous Racism at Land-Grant Universities," published in the January 2022 issue of Sociology of Race and Ethnicity.
